text: A gently floating breeze...
Takes me over the trees...
To the cloud and sky beyond...
My friends are red and blue and green..
Up above we are seen!
Sparking like fishes in pond
Over the houses we saw with miles to explore.
We are the rainbow color flying balloons
As we float over the sky with the windows up high.
We can see site so wonderful..
There are city swinging with delight night fills up with lights
And the world look just like teaching school
Over the houses is we saw with miles to explore..
We are the rainbow color flying balloons.
A gently floating breeze...

Up above we are seen!
